entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RemovePage by Name #2263
  • [Bug] Border Width seem to calculate differently on iOS vs Android #2262
  • [Bug] Android looks like it has a rounding different when apply Corner Radius vs iOS #2261
  • [Bug] Package not found #2260
  • [Bug] Starting app with RTL language doesn't currently work #2258
  • [Question] Platform specific codeand packages #2257
  • [Spec] Should BorderWidth be converted to Thickness? #2256
  • [Bug] Not all controls are currently working with RTL #2255
  • [Bug] Setting Border Width to zero causes the control to disappear on Android #2254
  • [Bug] Remap the existing IBorderElement properties so they propagate to the new Border Property #2253
  • WPF/WinForms Blazor Desktop need to override WebViewManager to use static web assets #2252
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Bug] Theme not applied to Switch control (Android) #2249
  • [Bug] Maui-Blazor Project Template crashes in Release Mode #2246
  • Add MauiAppBuilder top-level properties for common features: Handlers, Fonts, etc. #2245
  • Add support for hosted services in .NET MAUI apps #2244
  • Use top-level statements + source gen for .NET MAUI app startup/config code #2243
  • Consider changing the names of the native app base types (MauiWinUIApplication, MauiApplication, MauiUIApplicationDelegate) #2242

Closed

  • Make AbsoluteLayout a new layout #1961
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] TableView and its underlying elements need to implement IVisualTreeElement overrides #2124
    partner, partner/ui-tools

Updated

  • [Bug] Connection refused when calling ASP.NET Core API endpoints from .NET MAUI Blazor App #1707
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Bug] The application crashes if a Frame is placed inside another one on the main page #2119
  • [Bug] Updating Image Properties through Code-Behind does not reflect in UI. #2153
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.2
  • [Bug] [Android] Adding new Cell to existing Table Section causes Java.Lang.IllegalStateException #2123
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.2
  • [Bug] MSAL B2C 'Window Not Found' #2154
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] FilePicker throws System.InvalidOperationException: 'Window Not Found' #2102
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Enhancement] Support Min|Max Height|Width on FrameworkElement #709
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Setting ScrollbarVisibility in ScrollView is not working #2202
  • [Spec] Implement ContentView inside Core #1302
  • [Enhancement] Provide DPI info API #1811
    t/enhancement ☀️, partner, partner/ui-tools
  • [Bug] - Error installing maui workload - arch64-linux-android-ld.exe' because it is being used by another process. #2082
  • [Spec] Transitions #6
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area/animation 🎬, .NET 7
  • Workload installation failed: Workload not found: microsoft-android-sdk-full. Known workloads: android android-aot ios maccatalyst macos maui maui-mobile maui-desktop maui-core maui-android maui-maccatalyst maui-ios maui-windows tvos microsoft-net-sdk-emscripten wasm-tools microsoft-net-runtime-android microsoft-net-runtime-android-aot microsoft-net-runtime-ios runtimes-ios microsoft-net-runtime-maccatalyst runtimes-maccatalyst microsoft-net-runtime-macos microsoft-net-runtime-tvos runtimes-tvos microsoft-net-runtime-mono-tooling #2232
  • Check Xaml capabilities in maui #2148
  • Reconcile Essentials API's with MAUI #1965
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.100-rc.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #2267
  • Start to remove old things in Maui #2266
  • Support Min/Max Height/Width on IView #2265
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • BoxView Handlers #2250
  • [ci] Opt in to symbol archiving during VS insertion #2248

Merged

  • remove TypeConversionAttribute #2210
  • Android/iOS Button ImageSource #2079
    t/breaking 💥, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • Build the templates #2264
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ScreenReader.Announce implementation for WINUI #2251
  • Insert iOS subviews correctly #2259
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Implement FlowDirection property in ViewHandlers #948
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Bump to Reloadify3000 1.0.7 #2218
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [build] fix local 'dotnet cake' builds #2234
  • ContentView XAML Item Template #2064
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Add exception handling for GatherXmlnsDefinitionAttributes Assembly Loading #2229
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentView CSharp Item Template #2065
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #2236
  • ContentPage CSharp Item Template #2063
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • AbsoluteLayout #2136
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Can't include windows on mac #2241
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2240
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement IVisualTreeElement for TableView #2237
  • Make Application.Properties obsolete and fix implementation #2158
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • PartialAppManifest is now a real feature #2238
  • Update SkiaSharp and add pdb files #2195
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Update to WindowsAppSdk 1.0.0-experimental #2047
    6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • Updating .NET MAUI to use MauiApp/MauiAppBuilder pattern and use MS.Extensions.DependencyInjection #2137
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Include Border everywhere #650
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-android #2227
  • Minimal changes to support RemoteWebView #1697
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Implement WebView2 async request handling with deferral #2055
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Update Android Gallery to use Maui #1558
    6.0.100-rc.2
